data.text: @SonnyBunch Deace is a fool. Has been a fool for years.
@BadPostsLLC @SonnyBunch I for one am ready for the conversation about whether or not Zelenskyy is a twink
@SonnyBunch It always comes down to "THEY are out to get us!" I don't see the attraction in always posing as the victims of some vast conspiracy by "them."
@SonnyBunch Trying to figure out why this is a thing makes my brain swell up as much as the “prove Europe is a continent,” theorem.
@SonnyBunch And all spouting dialogue from like a c tier matrix knockoff
@SonnyBunch The conspiratorial mind sees connections everywhere.
@SonnyBunch Trump isn’t strongly anti-Putin, so the people who line up to suck him off refuse to strongly condemn Putin. https://t.co/tFlOyEOQhN

@SonnyBunch Just as X, and so like Y. Here, in Z, it is all the SAME.

This is a form of logic called Modus Dimwit.

@SonnyBunch Covid was a SHTF moment for public health, but the riots were a SHTF moment for public safety for some of us... and even among folks in the same generation, I've noticed a slight split there in my circle between those who had to plywood up or watch NG or PD helicopters in 2020.
